abstract: A famous problem on finding the best strategy for a bunch of prisoners to free themselves by communicating through a light bulb.

lead_paragraph: 12:41 p.m. | Updated Today, we present a version of a famous problem that is extraordinarily rich in the possibilities it offers for constructing strategies. I have altered some of the details, changed the story somewhat and have also decreased the numbers, so you can more easily try strategies without being intimidated by large numbers.
